page.title: 14RELIGION-BASSALEG PARISH-1
page.content: There are 8 places of worship in the area.The oldest is St.Basil's Church in Wales in Bassaleg,on a site which predates Norman times.St.John's in Rogerstone is a daughter church in the same parish.The Bethesda Baptist Church,Rogerstone has a flourishing membership with a large youth section of about 50 members.It was first built in 1744,but has been rebuilt and enlarged since then.In the early 19th century it helped to found the Bethel Baptist Church in Bassaleg. Bethel has an outside baptistry,of which there are only 3 examples in Gwent.The Wesleyan Methodist Church on the road between Rhiwderin and Bassaleg was celebrating its centenary year in 1970.There is a new Methodist Church just outside our area,in Glasllwch Lane.
